Change Log
===========

0.01 (2020/07/02)
    Initial release
0.04 (2020/07/11)
    Minor additions
0.05 (2020/07/29)
    Add time methods and logging
0.06 (2020/08/13)
    * Updated logging methods to not refer to config files.
    * Add filters to list_files method
    * execute_by_pool now uses create_logger
